summary: A group of leather-clad bikers are on the trail of the female bikers who are stealing babies all over the state and selling them on the black market.
cast: Paul Le Mat|Eileen Davidson|Marjorie Bransfield|Jon Menick|Barry Livingston|Mark Holton|Theresa Randle|Jami Richards|Karen Russell|Roberta Vasquez|Stevie Sterling|Carlos Compean|Mike Leinert|Lisa Nelson|Robert Traviano|Robert Miano|Ted Raimi|Joe Shea|Rebecca York|Dan Hicks|Kevin Brophy|Louan Gideon|Barry Doe|Annie O'Donnell|Ben Stein|Joleen Lutz|Ivan Naranjo|George Plimpton|Sony|Ron Holmstrom|Barry Eisen|Gary Ballard|R.J. Walker|Dimitri Villard|Fargo|Tracy Gallagher|Amber Love|Amanda Geogieff|Cory Elmore|Rick Elmore|Karen C. O'Malley
title: Motor baby
